title: Estimated number of World of Warcraft subscribers 2015 to 2023
summary: In general Subscribers in millions has fallen over the Year.
Subscribers in millions is slightly decreasing from 2017 to 2022.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
The highest Subscribers in millions, of value 5.42 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Subscribers in millions, of value 4.59 was reported at Year 2022
